price: nítorí náà, ẹnikẹ́ni tó bá ń wá n̄ǹkan mìíràn lẹ́yìn ìyẹn, àwọn wọ̀nyẹn gan-an ni olùtayọ-ẹnu ààlà;
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
